channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: I quit Ozempic and embraced feeling healthy over striving for thinness
item.description: Taking the drug made one writer feel so sick she quit and focused on healthy habits instead of her body size. Turns out, 65% of people using GLP-1 dru...

item.title: Mercury, Venus and Saturn to delight stargazers in a parade across the sky
item.description: The pre-dawn sky will feature a glowing crescent moon, joined by planets Mercury, Venus and Saturn.

item.title: How to get older men to socialize is a puzzle. A group called ROMEO is one answer
item.description: ROMEO stands for "retired older men eating out," and it's helping guys in one Maine town get out of the house and into more friendships.

item.title: Wrong turn leads to hundreds of immigrant arrests at the Detroit-Canada border bridge
item.description: NPR has for months been receiving tips about detentions at the Ambassador Bridge in Michigan. An inquiry by Representative Rashida Tlaib, a Michigan D...

item.title: Lawyers warn clients of increased arrest risk at immigration check-ins
item.description: Immigration attorneys are advising clients who have deportation orders when they show up at court dates and immigration appointments, there is an incr...

item.title: Benin admits that 54 soldiers killed in attack by al-Qaeda group
item.description: This is the deadliest known attack since insurgents began operating in Benin at the beginning of the decade.

item.title: Pakistan suspends visas for Indians after deadly Kashmir attack on tourists
item.description: It comes after Delhi's retaliatory measures following a militant attack in Indian-administered Kashmir that killed 26 tourists.

item.title: Trump says he is 'not happy' with deadly Russian strikes on Kyiv
item.description: The overnight strikes killed at least eight people and injured 77 more, local officials have said.

item.title: Trump asks Supreme Court to let him enforce transgender military ban
item.description: President Trump signed an executive order that directed the Pentagon to develop a policy that would bar transgender people from serving in the militar...

item.title: Could this be the end of the road for Tanzania's great survivor?
item.description: Tundu Lissu has survived against the political odds over the years but has now been charged with treason.

item.title: South Africa and Ukraine woo each other - as relationships with Trump turn sour
item.description: Volodymyr Zelensky ends an historic visit to South Africa to counter Russia's influence on the continent.

item.title: 4/23: America Decides
item.description: Treasury Secretary Bessent says, "America first does not mean America alone." N.C. Supreme Court race still not certified

item.title: Inside the monarch butterfly migration mystery: flying to Mexico from Canada, the U.S.
item.description: Monarchs traveled to a remote part of Mexico, a journey they've made for thousands of years, and wintered there. Now tens of millions of the butterfli...

item.title: 4/21: America Decides
item.description: Global tributes pour in for Pope Francis; Presidents and lawakers honor Pope Francis' legacy

item.title: What's next for AI at DeepMind, Google's artificial intelligence lab | 60 Minutes
item.description: At Google DeepMind, researchers are chasing what's called artificial general intelligence: a silicon intellect as versatile as a human's, but with sup...

item.title: From banning tech to ending sister-city ties, US states have at least 240 anti-China proposals
Most Americans expect higher prices as a result of Trump’s tariffs, a new AP-NORC poll finds
item.description: A new AP-NORC poll suggests Americans’ trust in President Donald Trump to bolster the U.S. economy appears to be faltering.

item.title: Head of NAACP disinvited from speaking to Texas state bar over suit against Trump administration
